participant_1.background:
My paddle board is calling my name.
I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things.
i have often been called a slacker.
my brother and i have bright red hair.
I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.

participant_2.background:
I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert.
my mom is a nurse.
i love to crochet.
My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.
I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.

content.text: Hello! I am a clumsy person, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things! What do you like to do?
Hello! I crochet and love designer French fries. What do you do for fun?
I love to paddle board! I have never been to the west coast but I really want to go. Where are you from?
I have driven my Mercedes through the Arizona desert. I am from California. Do you have a favorite food?
I love all kinds of food but I am not a picky eater. What is your favorite type of French fry?
I like designer French fries because they are a fun way to enjoy a classic side dish. What do you think about my mom being a nurse?
My mom is a nurse too! She is the best. What is your favorite thing about her?
I love that she is always so supportive and encouraging of my hobbies. What is your favorite thing about your brother?
My brother is the smartest person I know. We have bright red hair and we are both clumsy. Do you have any siblings?
I have three siblings, two brothers and one sister. We all have different personalities but we are all close.
